title: ASkyBlock打火石问题
author: COCO_CHENL
txt_content: 玩家可以使用打火石但是打出来的火会马上消失怎么解决

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
config.yml 中，设置

     # Allow fire (flint & steel use, TNT priming) Making portals is allowed.
     FIRE: true

replies.author: COCO_CHENL
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-28 15:56
config.yml 中，设置

     # Allow fire (flint & steel use, TNT priming) Making portals is allowed.
不行啊 打火石打出的火立马消失
